name: Duckly
headline: Video chat with real-time collaboration.
description:
Duckly enables teams to talk and collaborate in real-time.

Teams can use a simple URL that is easy to join and remember. You can share a website and allow your colleagues to click, type, and browse with you. You can share your code directly from your IDE or even share a terminal session that your team can interact with. All with high-quality audio and video chat.

We are building tools for real-time remote collaboration that makes it easy for teams to work as if they were side by side and share what they know.

founders.name: Thiago Monteiro, Founder
founders.description: I'm an avid learner that tackle business opportunities from a design point of view.

![Duckly logo](https://duckly.com)
# Multiplayer coding
Duckly enables you to talk and share your code in real-time with developers using any IDE.
[Get started](https://duckly.com/</tools>)
![](https://duckly.com/_next/static/images/duckly-hero-illustration-t-5e2a9eca0bd2ed8ed39abaaa8e6eb63b.png)
![](https://duckly.com/_next/static/images/landing-demo-feb11-2022-opt-3a860103c343e3df5ba6f3c30cc19ee3.jpeg)
Their teams and hundreds more are using Duckly.
![Graphcms logo](https://duckly.com)![Tangobuilder logo](https://duckly.com)![Delivery Hero logo](https://duckly.com)
![Cazoo logo](https://duckly.com)![Sublime logo](https://duckly.com)![Textnow logo](https://duckly.com)![Busbud logo](https://duckly.com)
![Uniplaces logo](https://duckly.com)![Engelvoelkers logo](https://duckly.com)![](https://duckly.com)
[Join now](https://duckly.com/</tools>)
## All-in-one tool for code collaboration
Collaborate in real-time, without having to switch between different applications. Duckly enables you to work with other developers directly from your IDE.
![](https://duckly.com)
Collaborate with any IDE
Share your code in real-time with people using a different IDE than you.
![](https://duckly.com)
Real-time sharing
See other developers cursors and code together in real-time from your IDE.
![](https://duckly.com)
End-to-end encryption
All connections are peer-to-peer and end-to-end encrypted.
![](https://duckly.com)
Share Terminal
Share your terminal session with your developers read-only or write access.
![](https://duckly.com)
Share Server
Share your local server with your team and let them see the changes in real-time.
![](https://duckly.com)
Audio & Video
Talk with audio, video and share your screen directly inside of your IDE.
### Collaborate with other developers in real-time
![](https://duckly.com/_next/static/images/small-image-pairprogramming-2bbfc0606fc0cfe41fbce6b2135c777f.png)
##### Pair Programming
Share your code and collaborate in real-time with multiple developers using different IDEs so each person can use their favorite IDE. Making the experience faster and easier to everyone.
![](https://duckly.com/_next/static/images/small-image-codereview-058dc33ddb880ee0f9679de6f6c43b30.png)
##### Code Reviews
Instead of reviewing code alone, talk and work with others directly from your IDE. Collaborate with other developers in real-time and speed up the code review process.
![](https://duckly.com/_next/static/images/small-image-codetogether-22f07bca34669d66a5da41c7fc451dad.png)
##### Code together
Become a better developer by collaborating in real-time with your team. You can share your code, terminal, and even work on the same file together in real-time to move projects forward faster.
You're in good company
[![Duckly - Collaborate on any page with a Figma-like experience | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-badge.svg?post_id=295035&theme=light&period=daily)](https://duckly.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/duckly?utm_source=badge-top-post-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-duckly>)
Duckly is the most used collaboration tool for our engineering, data science and machine learning teams. As we all work remotely, it has made live coding together much easier and productive.
Rab Memari, canal.ai
Duckly is so awesome! "Let's duck!" "Wanna duck?" and "Duck it!" have become part of our lexicon. You can pair program in VS Code and PhpStorm at the same time. Sounds crazy, but it works.
Vlad Stanca, Kobami
Duckly helps my team to work closer and keep the communication and collaboration in sync. Clear audio and video quality and real-time tools like the CoBrowsing.
Ruben Lang, TropiPay
### Stop coding alone.
[Get started now](https://duckly.com/</tools>)
![](https://duckly.com/_next/static/images/duckly-stop-coding-alone-602b90724f6c12c8760f32d98d940a4a.png)
[All tools](https://duckly.com/</tools>)[VS Code](https://duckly.com/</tools/vscode>)[IntelliJ](https://duckly.com/</tools/intellij>)[Android Studio](https://duckly.com/</tools/android-studio>)[WebStorm](https://duckly.com/</tools/webstorm>)[PyCharm](https://duckly.com/</tools/pycharm>)[PhpStorm](https://duckly.com/</tools/phpstorm>)[GoLand](https://duckly.com/</tools/goland>)[RubyMine](https://duckly.com/</tools/rubymine>)[Rider](https://duckly.com/</tools/rider>)[CLion](https://duckly.com/</tools/clion>)[AppCode](https://duckly.com/</tools/appcode>)[DataGrip](https://duckly.com/</tools/datagrip>)[Chrome extension](https://duckly.com/</tools/chrome-extension>)[Terminal](https://duckly.com/</tools/terminal>)
[About](https://duckly.com/</about>)[Pricing](https://duckly.com/</pricing>)[Roadmap](https://duckly.com/<https:/trello.com/b/nl38gbF4/duckly-transparent-roadmap>)[Changelog](https://duckly.com/<https:/twitter.com/DucklyHQ/status/1224217066430844933>)
[FAQ](https://duckly.com/</faq>)[Security](https://duckly.com/</security>)[Terms of Service](https://duckly.com/</terms>)[Privacy Policy](https://duckly.com/</privacy-policy>)
[Blog](https://duckly.com/</blog>)[Twitter](https://duckly.com/<https:/twitter.com/DucklyHQ>)[GitHub](https://duckly.com/<https:/github.com/GitDuckHQ>)
![Duckly icon](https://duckly.com)
Duckly is where developers collaborate in real-time.GitDuck, Inc.

generated_description:
### Duckly: Revolutionizing Real-Time Collaboration

Founded in 2019 and hailing from the innovative hub of San Francisco, Duckly is all about making remote collaboration as seamless as possible for developers. Their mission is straightforward: to facilitate video chat combined with real-time collaboration, enabling teams to work together as if they were side-by-side‚Äîno matter where they are in the world.

Duckly‚Äôs approach is refreshingly simple and user-friendly. By sharing a straightforward URL, teams can instantly jump into a collaborative environment. Users can share websites, collaborate on code right from their IDE, and even share terminal sessions for interactive work. All this is backed up by high-quality audio and video chat.

At its core, Duckly provides a robust set of tools designed for real-time, remote collaboration. The platform encourages developers to stop coding alone, fostering a more interactive and productive workflow. 

#### Key Features:
- **Multi-IDE Collaboration**: Whether you‚Äôre using VS Code, IntelliJ, or any other IDE, Duckly lets you share your coding environment in real-time, allowing everyone to contribute effectively.
- **Real-Time Sharing**: You can see other developers' cursors and changes in real-time, promoting a fluid collaborative process.
- **Embedded Audio & Video**: Integrated audio and video chat means discussions can happen right alongside the work, reducing the need to switch between different apps.
- **Security**: With end-to-end encryption and peer-to-peer connections, Duckly takes security seriously.

In addition to coding together, Duckly simplifies the code review process. Instead of going it alone, developers can interact directly, speeding up feedback and revisions.

#### The Community
Duckly has caught the attention of many companies and developers alike. Teams from various organizations are using Duckly to enhance their collaborative efforts, praising its high-quality experience. Users rave about its ease of use and how it has significantly improved their remote coding sessions.

With a small but dedicated team of five and backed by Y Combinator‚Äôs S20 batch, Duckly is well-positioned to push boundaries in the developer tools space.

#### In Summary
Duckly isn't just another collaboration tool; it‚Äôs a game-changer for teams that value real-time interaction and streamlined workflows. If you‚Äôre a developer looking to collaborate effectively remote, you might want to check them out at [Duckly.com](https://duckly.com). 

Stop coding alone‚Äîjoin the collaboration revolution!
